metadata.Title: CVE-2004-2771 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The expand function in fio.c in Heirloom mailx 12.5 and earlier and BSD mailx 8.1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in an email address.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2004-2771` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsd-mailx - 8.1.2-0.20040524cvs-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bsd-mailx package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.2-0.20040524cvs-2').
